benchmark_details.name: BannerRequest400
benchmark_details.overview: BannerRequest400 is a benchmark featuring 100 unique logos paired with 400 diverse banner requests, designed for evaluating advertising banner generation systems.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and advance automatic advertising banner design generation capabilities through diverse design requests.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The benchmark primarily utilizes logo images as multimodal input and does not address product images or complex decorative elements.

data.source: Curated logos and banner design requests synthesized for the benchmark.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are based on assessments from human evaluators and GPT-4o ratings across multiple iterations.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in generating banner designs that align with marketing objectives.
methodology.baseline_results: Comparative evaluations against models including DALL-E3, FLUX.1-schnell, and OpenCOLE demonstrated the superior performance of the BannerAgency framework.
methodology.validation: Continuous validation through human studies and automated metric evaluations.
